articles.title: Will the AI Boom Go Bust? The Trillion-Dollar Question Defining 2026
tldr: Tech giants are spending hundreds of billions on AI infrastructure with uncertain returns.
Energy consumption is a major bottleneck, driving investments in nuclear power.
"Model Collapse" and geopolitical tensions pose significant ongoing risks to growth.

articles.title: FIFA World Cup 2026: A $15 Billion Revolution Across Three Nations
tldr: The 2026 World Cup features 48 teams playing across USA, Canada, and Mexico.
Investments are focused on upgrading existing 'Smart Stadiums' rather than building new ones.
Mexico's Estadio Azteca makes history as the first three-time host venue.

articles.title: The Great Crypto Reset of 2026: Regulation, Institutionalization, and the End of the Wild West
tldr: 2026 sees the implementation of strict global crypto regulations, ending anonymity.
Institutional investors are dominating the market via ETFs and Tokenized Assets (RWA).
Privacy battles heat up as governments ban anonymous coins and enforce surveillance.
